c:complexType.name: PointChartCommonOptions
c:complexType.c:documentation: The common options documentation class for the Line/Dot/Area family charts.

c:property.name: visualRoles
c:property.c:documentation: The visual roles that are common to the line/dot/area family chart types.

c:complexType.name: PointCommonVisualRoles
c:complexType.c:documentation: The visual roles common to the point chart types.

c:property.name: value
c:property.c:documentation:
The value visual role controls the orthogonal position of points.
The value visual role automatically binds to a single numeric dimension whose name has the value prefix.
The value visual role is required.
See for more information on supported data types.

c:complexType.name: PointPlotCommonOptions
c:complexType.c:documentation: The common options documentation class of the point plots.

c:property.name: trend
c:property.c:documentation:
Contains the plot's trending options.
Besides the property concatenation way of specifying this property and its sub-properties, this option may also be specified as a plain JSON object.

c:property.name: areasVisible
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if the visual elements are connected with shaded areas extending from the visual elements to the zero line.

c:property.name: showAreas
c:property.c:documentation: Use instead. Indicates if the visual elements are connected with shaded areas extending from the visual elements to the zero line.
